title: 2025 F1 reserve drivers: the hopefuls on standby for each GP team
summary: Every F1 team's reserve and test drivers for the 2025 season: Felipe Drugovich will replace Fernando Alonso in FP1 for the 2025 Hungarian GP after the Spaniard had back issues

qa_pairs.question: Who is the reserve driver for Aston Martin in the 2025 season?
In which Grand Prix will Felipe Drugovich replace Fernando Alonso in 2025?
What was the reason for Fernando Alonso missing the 2025 Hungarian GP's FP1 session?
